data.title: POOR RELATIONS — FILMSHOP
data.text:
NARRATIVE - Poor Relations

Narrative Series

Title: Poor Relations

Page Count: 30 pages

Project Status: In Development

Logline

After a funeral home loses the body of the grandmother who raised him, a man is forced to accept help from the mother who abandoned him as a child, bringing her back into his life and that of his family of colorful characters.

Synopsis

When REGGIE and MYRNA—two mixed race siblings growing up in the 90s— were kids, his mother CELESTE—a white woman—abandoned the two of them to be raised by their paternal grandmother, Helen. Thirty years later, Helen has died, Myrna is out of the picture and Reggie is struggling to financially support his family: wife MARIEL, tween daughter NICOLE, precocious seven year old GIGI, and troublemaking toddler ALEX. When the cut-rate funeral home they hired for the funeral loses Helen’s body in a mix-up, the timing couldn’t be any worse for Celeste to resurface, yet resurface she does. See, Celeste has been trying to turn her life around for the past few decades and she is set to marry a wealthy family man who’s unaware of the estrangement between Celeste and her now adult children. When Celeste offers to help Reggie and his family out financially, Reggie knows that help will come with strings attached, namely Celeste’s renewed presence in his life; a presence sure to stir up all sorts of conflict considering the cocktail of strong personalities present in this interracial family.

Team

Written by: Jose Nateras & Lizbett Perez, Story by: Lizbett Perez

Seeking

Development Funds, Investors, Producing Partners, Production Company,
